<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/items/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update an item by ID

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"Item"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated item"},"404":{"description":"Item not found"}}}
